text: Allah niscaya'i tomadera adesa karachena yena tomara amanata tadera basindadera samarpana karo, ara yakhana to mara lokadera madhye bicara-acara karo takhana yena n'yayaparayanatara sathe bicara karo. Nihsandeha allah ki uttama upadesa tomadera diye thakena! Nihsandeha allah hacchena sarbasrota, sarbadarsi.
